Achieving a strong redox ability and high visible-light absorption ability in a single semiconductor material is difficult.Designing a heterojunction between two semiconductor materials is a feasible method.The new step (S-scheme) heterojunction can effectively promote the separation and transfer of photogenerated electron-hole pairs and retain strong redox ability.We designed and prepared a CdSe0.8S0.2-diethylenetriamine(DETA)SnNb2O6 heterostructure material via the solvothermal method.When
